283    {
284        try {
285            fieldPlayer = PlayerEvent.class.getDeclaredField("player");
286            fieldPlayer.setAccessible(true);
287        } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {
288            e.printStackTrace();
289        }
290    }
291
292    @Inject
293    public PlayerEventListener(
294            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager,
295            final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher,
296            final @NonNull WorldEdit worldEdit,
297            final @NonNull PlotListener plotListener
298    ) {
299        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
300        this.worldEdit = worldEdit;
301        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
302        this.plotListener = plotListener;
303    }
304
305    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true, priority = EventPriority.LOWEST)
306    public void onBlockBreak(final BlockBreakEvent event) {
307        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getLocation());
308        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
309        if (area == null) {
310            return;
311        }
312        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
313        if (plot != null) {
314            event.setDropItems(plot.getFlag(TileDropFlag.class));
315        }
316    }
317
318    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
319    public void onPlayerDyeSign(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
320        ItemStack itemStack = event.getItem();
321        if (itemStack == null) {
322            return;
323        }
324        Block block = event.getClickedBlock();
325        if (block != null && block.getState() instanceof Sign) {
326            if (DYES.contains(itemStack.getType().toString())) {
327                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
328                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
329                if (area == null) {
330                    return;
331                }
332                Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
333                if (plot == null) {
334                    if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, EditSignFlag.class, false)
335                            && !event.getPlayer().hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD.toString())) {
336                        event.setCancelled(true);
337                    }
338                    return;
339                }
340                if (plot.isAdded(event.getPlayer().getUniqueId())) {
341                    return; // allow for added players
342                }
343                if (!plot.getFlag(EditSignFlag.class)
344                        && !event.getPlayer().hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER.toString())) {
345                    plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " could not color the sign because of edit-sign = false");
346                    event.setCancelled(true);
347                }
348            }
349        }
350    }
351
352    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true)
353    public void onEffect(@NonNull EntityPotionEffectEvent event) {
354        if (Settings.Enabled_Components.DISABLE_BEACON_EFFECT_OVERFLOW ||
355                event.getCause() != EntityPotionEffectEvent.Cause.BEACON ||
356                !(event.getEntity() instanceof Player player)) {
357            return;
358        }
359
360        UUID uuid = player.getUniqueId();
361        PotionEffect effect = event.getNewEffect();
362        if (effect == null) {
363            PotionEffect oldEffect = event.getOldEffect();
364            if (oldEffect != null) {
365                String name = oldEffect.getType().getName();
366                plotListener.addEffect(uuid, name, -1);
367            }
368        } else {
369            long expiresAt = System.currentTimeMillis() + effect.getDuration() * 50L; //Convert ticks to milliseconds
370            String name = effect.getType().getName();
371            plotListener.addEffect(uuid, name, expiresAt);
372        }
373    }
374
375    @EventHandler
376    public void onVehicleEntityCollision(VehicleEntityCollisionEvent e) {
377        if (e.getVehicle() instanceof Boat) {
378            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getEntity().getLocation());
379            if (location.isPlotArea()) {
380                if (e.getEntity() instanceof Player) {
381                    PlotPlayer<Player> player = BukkitUtil.adapt((Player) e.getEntity());
382                    Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
383                    if (plot != null) {
384                        if (!plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
385                            //Here the event is only canceled if the player is not the owner
386                            //of the property on which he is located.
387                            e.setCancelled(true);
388                        }
389                    } else {
390                        e.setCancelled(true);
391                    }
392                } else {
393                    //Here the event is cancelled too, otherwise you can move the
394                    //boat with EchoPets or other mobs running around on the plot.
395                    e.setCancelled(true);
396                }
397            }
398        }
399    }
400
401    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true, priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
402    public void playerCommand(PlayerCommandPreprocessEvent event) {
403        String msg = event.getMessage().replace("/", "").toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).trim();
404        if (msg.isEmpty()) {
405            return;
406        }
407        Player player = event.getPlayer();
408        PlotPlayer<Player> plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
409        Location location = plotPlayer.getLocation();
410        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
411        if (area == null) {
412            return;
413        }
414        String[] parts = msg.split(" ");
415        Plot plot = plotPlayer.getCurrentPlot();
416        // Check WorldEdit
417        switch (parts[0]) {
418            case "up", "worldedit:up" -> {
419                if (plot == null || (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID()) && !plotPlayer.hasPermission(
420                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER,
421                        true
422                ))) {
423                    event.setCancelled(true);
424                    return;
425                }
426            }
427        }
428        if (plot == null && !area.isRoadFlags()) {
429            return;
430        }
431
432        List<String> blockedCommands = plot != null ?
433                plot.getFlag(BlockedCmdsFlag.class) :
434                area.getFlag(BlockedCmdsFlag.class);
435        if (blockedCommands.isEmpty()) {
436            return;
437        }
438        if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_BLOCKED_CMDS)) {
439            return;
440        }
441        // When using namespaced commands, we're not interested in the namespace
442        String part = parts[0];
443        if (part.contains(":")) {
444            String[] namespaced = part.split(":");
445            part = namespaced[1];
446            msg = msg.substring(namespaced[0].length() + 1);
447        }
448        msg = replaceAliases(msg, part);
449        for (String blocked : blockedCommands) {
450            if (blocked.equalsIgnoreCase(msg)) {
451                String perm;
452                if (plot != null && plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
453                    perm = "plots.admin.command.blocked-cmds.shared";
454                } else {
455                    perm = "plots.admin.command.blocked-cmds.road";
456                }
457                if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(perm)) {
458                    plotPlayer.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("blockedcmds.command_blocked"));
459                    event.setCancelled(true);
460                }
461                return;
462            }
463        }
464    }
465
466    private String replaceAliases(String msg, String part) {
467        String s1 = part;
468        Set<String> aliases = new HashSet<>();
469        for (HelpTopic cmdLabel : Bukkit.getServer().getHelpMap().getHelpTopics()) {
470            if (part.equals(cmdLabel.getName())) {
471                break;
472            }
473            String label = cmdLabel.getName().replaceFirst("/", "");
474            if (aliases.contains(label)) {
475                continue;
476            }
477            PluginCommand p = Bukkit.getPluginCommand(label);
478            if (p != null) {
479                for (String a : p.getAliases()) {
480                    if (aliases.contains(a)) {
481                        continue;
482                    }
483                    aliases.add(a);
484                    a = a.replaceFirst("/", "");
485                    if (!a.equals(label) && a.equals(part)) {
486                        part = label;
487                        break;
488                    }
489                }
490            }
491        }
492        if (!s1.equals(part)) {
493            msg = msg.replace(s1, part);
494        }
495        return msg;
496    }
497
498    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
499    public void onPreLogin(final AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent event) {
500        final UUID uuid;
501        if (Settings.UUID.OFFLINE) {
502            if (Settings.UUID.FORCE_LOWERCASE) {
503                uuid = UUID.nameUUIDFromBytes(("OfflinePlayer:" + event.getName().toLowerCase()).getBytes(Charsets.UTF_8));
504            } else {
505                uuid = UUID.nameUUIDFromBytes(("OfflinePlayer:" + event.getName()).getBytes(Charsets.UTF_8));
506            }
507        } else {
508            uuid = event.getUniqueId();
509        }
510        PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline().storeImmediately(event.getName(), uuid);
511    }
512
513    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
514    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
515    public void onConnect(PlayerJoinEvent event) {
516        final Player player = event.getPlayer();
517        PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().removePlayer(player.getUniqueId());
518        final PlotPlayer<Player> pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
519
520        // we're stripping the country code as we don't want to differ between countries
521        pp.setLocale(Locale.forLanguageTag(player.getLocale().substring(0, 2)));
522
523        Location location = pp.getLocation();
524        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
525        if (area != null) {
526            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
527            if (plot != null) {
528                plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot);
529            }
530        }
531        // Delayed
532
533        // Async
534        TaskManager.runTaskLaterAsync(() -> {
535            if (!player.hasPlayedBefore() && player.isOnline()) {
536                player.saveData();
537            }
538            this.eventDispatcher.doJoinTask(pp);
539        }, TaskTime.seconds(1L));
540
541        if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION.toString()) && Settings.Enabled_Components.UPDATE_NOTIFICATIONS
542                && PremiumVerification.isPremium() && UpdateUtility.hasUpdate) {
543            Caption boundary = TranslatableCaption.of("update.update_boundary");
544            Caption updateNotification = TranslatableCaption.of("update.update_notification");
545            pp.sendMessage(boundary);
546            pp.sendMessage(
547                    updateNotification,
548                    TagResolver.builder()
549                            .tag("p2version", Tag.inserting(Component.text(UpdateUtility.internalVersion.versionString())))
550                            .tag("spigotversion", Tag.inserting(Component.text(UpdateUtility.spigotVersion)))
551                            .tag("downloadurl", Tag.preProcessParsed("https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/77506/updates"))
552                            .build()
553            );
554            pp.sendMessage(boundary);
555        }
556    }
557
558    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
559    public void playerRespawn(PlayerRespawnEvent event) {
560        Player player = event.getPlayer();
561        PlotPlayer<Player> pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
562        this.eventDispatcher.doRespawnTask(pp);
563    }

565    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // We explicitly want #getHomeSynchronous here
566    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
567    public void onTeleport(PlayerTeleportEvent event) {
568        Player player = event.getPlayer();
569        //We need to account for bad plugins like NoCheatPlus that teleports player on/before login -_-
570        if (!player.isOnline()) {
571            return;
572        }
573        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
574        try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
575                     pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
576            Plot lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
577            org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
578            //noinspection ConstantConditions
579            if (to != null) {
580                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
581                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
582                if (area == null) {
583                    if (lastPlot != null) {
584                        plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot);
585                        lastPlotAccess.remove();
586                    }
587                    try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
588                                 pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
589                        lastLocationAccess.remove();
590                    }
591                    return;
592                }
593                Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
594                if (plot != null && !plot.equals(lastPlot)) {
595                    final boolean result = DenyTeleportFlag.allowsTeleport(pp, plot);
596                    // there is one possibility to still allow teleportation:
597                    // to is identical to the plot's home location, and untrusted-visit is true
598                    // i.e. untrusted-visit can override deny-teleport
599                    // this is acceptable, because otherwise it wouldn't make sense to have both flags set
600                    if (result || (plot.getFlag(UntrustedVisitFlag.class) && plot.getHomeSynchronous().equals(BukkitUtil.adaptComplete(to)))) {
601                        // returns false if the player is not allowed to enter the plot (if they are denied, for example)
602                        // don't let the move event cancel the entry after teleport, but rather catch and cancel early (#4647)
603                        if (!plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot)) {
604                            event.setCancelled(true);
605                        }
606                    } else {
607                        pp.sendMessage(
608                                TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
609                                TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.toString())))
610                        );
611                        event.setCancelled(true);
612                    }
613                }
614            }
615        }
616        playerMove(event);
617    }
618
619    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
620    public void onWorldChanged(PlayerChangedWorldEvent event) {
621        Player player = event.getPlayer();
622        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
623        if (this.worldEdit != null) {
624            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_WORLDEDIT_BYPASS)) {
625                if (pp.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
626                    pp.removeAttribute("worldedit");
627                }
628            }
629        }
630    }
631
632    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
633    public void vehicleMove(VehicleMoveEvent event)
634            throws IllegalAccessException {
635        final org.bukkit.Location from = event.getFrom();
636        final org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
637
638        int toX, toZ;
639        if ((toX = MathMan.roundInt(to.getX())) != MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) | (toZ = MathMan.roundInt(to.getZ())) != MathMan
640                .roundInt(from.getZ())) {
641            Vehicle vehicle = event.getVehicle();
642
643            // Check allowed
644            if (!vehicle.getPassengers().isEmpty()) {
645                Entity passenger = vehicle.getPassengers().get(0);
646
647                if (passenger instanceof final Player player) {
648                    // reset
649                    if (moveTmp == null) {
650                        moveTmp = new PlayerMoveEvent(null, from, to);
651                    }
652                    moveTmp.setFrom(from);
653                    moveTmp.setTo(to);
654                    moveTmp.setCancelled(false);
655                    fieldPlayer.set(moveTmp, player);
656
657                    List<Entity> passengers = vehicle.getPassengers();
658
659                    this.playerMove(moveTmp);
660                    org.bukkit.Location dest;
661                    if (moveTmp.isCancelled()) {
662                        dest = from;
663                    } else if (MathMan.roundInt(moveTmp.getTo().getX()) != toX || MathMan.roundInt(moveTmp
664                            .getTo()
665                            .getZ()) != toZ) {
666                        dest = to;
667                    } else {
668                        dest = null;
669                    }
670                    if (dest != null) {
671                        vehicle.eject();
672                        vehicle.setVelocity(new Vector(0d, 0d, 0d));
673                        PaperLib.teleportAsync(vehicle, dest);
674                        passengers.forEach(vehicle::addPassenger);
675                        return;
676                    }
677                }
678                if (Settings.Enabled_Components.KILL_ROAD_VEHICLES) {
679                    final com.sk89q.worldedit.world.entity.EntityType entityType = BukkitAdapter.adapt(vehicle.getType());
680                    // Horses etc are vehicles, but they're also animals
681                    // so this filters out all living entities
682                    if (EntityCategories.VEHICLE.contains(entityType) && !EntityCategories.ANIMAL.contains(entityType)) {
683                        List<MetadataValue> meta = vehicle.getMetadata("plot");
684                        Plot toPlot = BukkitUtil.adapt(to).getPlot();
685                        if (!meta.isEmpty()) {
686                            Plot origin = (Plot) meta.get(0).value();
687                            if (origin != null && !origin.getBasePlot(false).equals(toPlot)) {
688                                vehicle.remove();
689                            }
690                        } else if (toPlot != null) {
691                            vehicle.setMetadata("plot", new FixedMetadataValue((Plugin) PlotSquared.platform(), toPlot));
692                        }
693                    }
694                }
695            }
696
697        }
698    }
699
700    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
701    public void playerMove(PlayerMoveEvent event) {
702        org.bukkit.Location from = event.getFrom();
703        org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
704        int x2;
705        if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) != (x2 = MathMan.roundInt(to.getX()))) {
706            Player player = event.getPlayer();
707            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
708            // Cancel teleport
709            if (TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(pp.getName())) {
710                pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleport_failed"));
711            }
712            // Set last location
713            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
714            try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
715                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
716                lastLocationAccess.remove();
717            }
718            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
719            if (area == null) {
720                try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
721                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
722                    lastPlotAccess.remove();
723                }
724                return;
725            }
726            Plot now = area.getPlot(location);
727            Plot lastPlot;
728            try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
729                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
730                lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
731            }
732            if (now == null) {
733                try (final MetaDataAccess<Boolean> kickAccess =
734                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_KICK)) {
735                    if (lastPlot != null && !plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot) && this.tmpTeleport && !kickAccess.get().orElse(
736                            false)) {
737                        pp.sendMessage(
738                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
739                                TagResolver.resolver(
740                                        "node",
741                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_EXIT_DENIED)
742                                )
743                        );
744                        this.tmpTeleport = false;
745                        if (lastPlot.equals(BukkitUtil.adapt(from).getPlot())) {
746                            player.teleport(from);
747                        } else {
748                            player.teleport(player.getWorld().getSpawnLocation());
749                        }
750                        this.tmpTeleport = true;
751                        event.setCancelled(true);
752                        return;
753                    }
754                }
755            } else if (now.equals(lastPlot)) {
756                ForceFieldListener.handleForcefield(player, pp, now);
757            } else if (!plotListener.plotEntry(pp, now) && this.tmpTeleport) {
758                pp.sendMessage(
759                        TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
760                        TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(now.toString())))
761                );
762                this.tmpTeleport = false;
763                to.setX(from.getBlockX());
764                to.setY(from.getBlockY());
765                to.setZ(from.getBlockZ());
766                player.teleport(event.getTo());
767                this.tmpTeleport = true;
768                return;
769            }
770            int border = area.getBorder(true);
771            int x1;
772            if (x2 > border && this.tmpTeleport) {
773                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
774                    to.setX(border - 1);
775                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
776                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
777                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
778                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
779                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) <= border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
780                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
781                }
782            } else if (x2 < -border && this.tmpTeleport) {
783                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
784                    to.setX(-border + 1);
785                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
786                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
787                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
788                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
789                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) >= -border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
790                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
791                }
792            } else if (((x1 = MathMan.roundInt(from.getX())) >= border && x2 <= border) || (x1 <= -border && x2 >= -border)) {
793                if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
794                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.entered"));
795                }
796            }
797        }
798        int z2;
799        if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) != (z2 = MathMan.roundInt(to.getZ()))) {
800            Player player = event.getPlayer();
801            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
802            // Cancel teleport
803            if (TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(pp.getName())) {
804                pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleport_failed"));
805            }
806            // Set last location
807            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
808            try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
809                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
810                lastLocationAccess.set(location);
811            }
812            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
813            if (area == null) {
814                try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
815                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
816                    lastPlotAccess.remove();
817                }
818                return;
819            }
820            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
821            Plot lastPlot;
822            try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
823                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
824                lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
825            }
826            if (plot == null) {
827                try (final MetaDataAccess<Boolean> kickAccess =
828                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_KICK)) {
829                    if (lastPlot != null && !plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot) && this.tmpTeleport && !kickAccess.get().orElse(
830                            false)) {
831                        pp.sendMessage(
832                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
833                                TagResolver.resolver(
834                                        "node",
835                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_EXIT_DENIED)
836                                )
837                        );
838                        this.tmpTeleport = false;
839                        if (lastPlot.equals(BukkitUtil.adapt(from).getPlot())) {
840                            player.teleport(from);
841                        } else {
842                            player.teleport(player.getWorld().getSpawnLocation());
843                        }
844                        this.tmpTeleport = true;
845                        event.setCancelled(true);
846                        return;
847                    }
848                }
849            } else if (plot.equals(lastPlot)) {
850                ForceFieldListener.handleForcefield(player, pp, plot);
851            } else if (!plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot) && this.tmpTeleport) {
852                pp.sendMessage(
853                        TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
854                        TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.toString())))
855                );
856                this.tmpTeleport = false;
857                player.teleport(from);
858                to.setX(from.getBlockX());
859                to.setY(from.getBlockY());
860                to.setZ(from.getBlockZ());
861                player.teleport(event.getTo());
862                this.tmpTeleport = true;
863                return;
864            }
865            int border = area.getBorder(true);
866            int z1;
867            if (z2 > border && this.tmpTeleport) {
868                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
869                    to.setZ(border - 1);
870                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
871                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
872                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
873                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
874                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) <= border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
875                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
876                }
877            } else if (z2 < -border && this.tmpTeleport) {
878                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
879                    to.setZ(-border + 1);
880                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
881                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
882                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
883                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
884                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) >= -border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
885                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
886                }
887            } else if (((z1 = MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ())) >= border && z2 <= border) || (z1 <= -border && z2 >= -border)) {
888                if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
889                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.entered"));
890                }
891            }
892        }
893    }
894
895    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW)
896    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
897    public void onChat(AsyncPlayerChatEvent event) {
898        if (event.isCancelled()) {
899            return;
900        }
901
902        BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
903        Location location = plotPlayer.getLocation();
904        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
905        if (area == null) {
906            return;
907        }
908        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
909        if (plot == null) {
910            return;
911        }
912        if (!((plot.getFlag(ChatFlag.class) && area.isPlotChat() && plotPlayer.getAttribute("chat"))
913                || area.isForcingPlotChat())) {
914            return;
915        }
916        if (plot.isDenied(plotPlayer.getUUID()) && !plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_CHAT_BYPASS)) {
917            return;
918        }
919        event.setCancelled(true);
920        Set<Player> recipients = event.getRecipients();
921        recipients.clear();
922        Set<PlotPlayer<?>> spies = new HashSet<>();
923        Set<PlotPlayer<?>> plotRecipients = new HashSet<>();
924        for (final PlotPlayer<?> pp : PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayers()) {
925            if (pp.getAttribute("chatspy")) {
926                spies.add(pp);
927            } else {
928                Plot current = pp.getCurrentPlot();
929                if (current != null && current.getBasePlot(false).equals(plot)) {
930                    plotRecipients.add(pp);
931                }
932            }
933        }
934        String message = event.getMessage();
935        String sender = event.getPlayer().getDisplayName();
936        PlotId id = plot.getId();
937        String worldName = plot.getWorldName();
938        Caption msg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_format");
939        TagResolver.Builder builder = TagResolver.builder();
940        builder.tag("world", Tag.inserting(Component.text(worldName)));
941        builder.tag("plot_id", Tag.inserting(Component.text(id.toString())));
942        builder.tag("sender", Tag.inserting(Component.text(sender)));
943        if (plotPlayer.hasPermission("plots.chat.color")) {
944            builder.tag("msg", Tag.inserting(MiniMessage.miniMessage().deserialize(
945                    message,
946                    TagResolver.resolver(StandardTags.color(), StandardTags.gradient(),
947                            StandardTags.rainbow(), StandardTags.decorations()
948                    )
949            )));
950        } else {
951            builder.tag("msg", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message)));
952        }
953        for (PlotPlayer<?> receiver : plotRecipients) {
954            receiver.sendMessage(msg, builder.build());
955        }
956        if (!spies.isEmpty()) {
957            Caption spymsg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_spy_format");
958            for (PlotPlayer<?> player : spies) {
959                player.sendMessage(spymsg, builder.tag("message", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message))).build());
960            }
961        }
962        if (Settings.Chat.LOG_PLOTCHAT_TO_CONSOLE) {
963            Caption spymsg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_spy_format");
964            ConsolePlayer.getConsole().sendMessage(
965                    spymsg,
966                    builder.tag("message", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message))).build()
967            );
968        }
969    }
970
971    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
972    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
973    public void onInventoryClick(InventoryClickEvent event) {
974        /*if (!event.isLeftClick() || (event.getAction() != InventoryAction.PLACE_ALL) || event
975            .isShiftClick()) {
976            return;
977        }*/
978        HumanEntity entity = event.getWhoClicked();
979        if (!(entity instanceof Player) || !this.plotAreaManager
980                .hasPlotArea(entity.getWorld().getName())) {
981            return;
982        }
983
984        HumanEntity clicker = event.getWhoClicked();
985        if (!(clicker instanceof Player player)) {
986            return;
987        }
988        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
989        final PlotInventory inventory = PlotInventory.getOpenPlotInventory(pp);
990        if (inventory != null && event.getRawSlot() == event.getSlot()) {
991            if (!inventory.onClick(event.getSlot())) {
992                event.setResult(Event.Result.DENY);
993                event.setCancelled(true);
994                inventory.close();
995            }
996        }
997        PlayerInventory inv = player.getInventory();
998        int slot = inv.getHeldItemSlot();
999        if ((slot > 8) || !event.getEventName().equals("InventoryCreativeEvent")) {
1000            return;
1001        }
1002        ItemStack oldItem = inv.getItemInHand();
1003        ItemMeta oldMeta = oldItem.getItemMeta();
1004        ItemStack newItem = event.getCursor();
1005        ItemMeta newMeta = newItem.getItemMeta();
1006
1007        if (event.getClick() == ClickType.CREATIVE) {
1008            final Plot plot = pp.getCurrentPlot();
1009            if (plot != null) {
1010                if (plot.getFlag(PreventCreativeCopyFlag.class) && !plot
1011                        .isAdded(player.getUniqueId()) && !pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1012                    final ItemStack newStack =
1013                            new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount());
1014                    event.setCursor(newStack);
1015                    plot.debug(player.getName()
1016                            + " could not creative-copy an item because prevent-creative-copy = true");
1017                }
1018            } else {
1019                PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1020                if (area != null && PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, PreventCreativeCopyFlag.class, true)) {
1021                    final ItemStack newStack =
1022                            new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount());
1023                    event.setCursor(newStack);
1024                }
1025            }
1026            return;
1027        }
1028
1029        String newLore = "";
1030        if (newMeta != null) {
1031            List<String> lore = newMeta.getLore();
1032            if (lore != null) {
1033                newLore = lore.toString();
1034            }
1035        }
1036        String oldLore = "";
1037        if (oldMeta != null) {
1038            List<String> lore = oldMeta.getLore();
1039            if (lore != null) {
1040                oldLore = lore.toString();
1041            }
1042        }
1043        Material itemType = newItem.getType();
1044        if (!"[(+NBT)]".equals(newLore) || (oldItem.equals(newItem) && newLore.equals(oldLore))) {
1045            if (newMeta == null || (itemType != Material.LEGACY_BANNER && itemType != Material.PLAYER_HEAD)) {
1046                return;
1047            }
1048        }
1049        Block block = player.getTargetBlock(null, 7);
1050        org.bukkit.block.BlockState state = block.getState();
1051        Material stateType = state.getType();
1052        if (stateType != itemType) {
1053            if (stateType == Material.LEGACY_WALL_BANNER || stateType == Material.LEGACY_STANDING_BANNER) {
1054                if (itemType != Material.LEGACY_BANNER) {
1055                    return;
1056                }
1057            } else if (stateType == Material.LEGACY_SKULL) {
1058                if (itemType != Material.LEGACY_SKULL_ITEM) {
1059                    return;
1060                }
1061            } else {
1062                return;
1063            }
1064        }
1065        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(state.getLocation());
1066        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1067        if (area == null) {
1068            return;
1069        }
1070        Plot plot = area.getPlotAbs(location);
1071        boolean cancelled = false;
1072        if (plot == null) {
1073            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)) {
1074                pp.sendMessage(
1075                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1076                        TagResolver.resolver(
1077                                "node",
1078                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1079                        )
1080                );
1081                cancelled = true;
1082            }
1083        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1084            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)) {
1085                pp.sendMessage(
1086                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1087                        TagResolver.resolver(
1088                                "node",
1089                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1090                        )
1091                );
1092                cancelled = true;
1093            }
1094        } else {
1095            UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1096            if (!plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1097                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1098                    pp.sendMessage(
1099                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1100                            TagResolver.resolver(
1101                                    "node",
1102                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1103                            )
1104                    );
1105                    cancelled = true;
1106                }
1107            }
1108        }
1109        if (cancelled) {
1110            if ((oldItem.getType() == newItem.getType()) && (oldItem.getDurability() == newItem
1111                    .getDurability())) {
1112                event.setCursor(
1113                        new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount(), newItem.getDurability()));
1114                event.setCancelled(true);
1115                return;
1116            }
1117            event.setCursor(
1118                    new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount(), newItem.getDurability()));
1119        }
1120    }
1121
1122    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1123    public void onInteract(PlayerInteractAtEntityEvent e) {
1124        Entity entity = e.getRightClicked();
1125        if (!(entity instanceof ArmorStand) && !(entity instanceof ItemFrame)) {
1126            return;
1127        }
1128        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getRightClicked().getLocation());
1129        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1130        if (area == null) {
1131            return;
1132        }
1133        EntitySpawnListener.testNether(entity);
1134        Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
1135        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getPlayer());
1136        if (plot == null) {
1137            if (!PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, MiscInteractFlag.class, true) && !pp.hasPermission(
1138                    Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD
1139            )) {
1140                pp.sendMessage(
1141                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1142                        TagResolver.resolver(
1143                                "node",
1144                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1145                        )
1146                );
1147                e.setCancelled(true);
1148            }
1149        } else {
1150            if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1151                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1152                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted"));
1153                    e.setCancelled(true);
1154                    return;
1155                }
1156            }
1157            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1158                if (!pp.hasPermission("plots.admin.interact.unowned")) {
1159                    pp.sendMessage(
1160                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1161                            TagResolver.resolver(
1162                                    "node",
1163                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1164                            )
1165                    );
1166                    e.setCancelled(true);
1167                }
1168            } else {
1169                UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1170                if (plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1171                    return;
1172                }
1173                if (plot.getFlag(MiscInteractFlag.class)) {
1174                    return;
1175                }
1176                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1177                    pp.sendMessage(
1178                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1179                            TagResolver.resolver(
1180                                    "node",
1181                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1182                            )
1183                    );
1184                    e.setCancelled(true);
1185                    plot.debug(pp.getName() + " could not interact with " + entity.getType()
1186                            + " because misc-interact = false");
1187                }
1188            }
1189        }
1190    }
1191
1192    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW)
1193    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
1194    public void onCancelledInteract(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
1195        if (event.isCancelled() && event.getAction() == Action.RIGHT_CLICK_AIR) {
1196            Player player = event.getPlayer();
1197            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1198            PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1199            if (area == null) {
1200                return;
1201            }
1202            if (event.getAction() == Action.RIGHT_CLICK_AIR) {
1203                Material item = event.getMaterial();
1204                if (item.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("_egg")) {
1205                    event.setCancelled(true);
1206                    event.setUseItemInHand(Event.Result.DENY);
1207                }
1208            }
1209            ItemStack hand = player.getInventory().getItemInMainHand();
1210            ItemStack offHand = player.getInventory().getItemInOffHand();
1211            Material type = hand.getType();
1212            Material offType = offHand.getType();
1213            if (type == Material.AIR) {
1214                type = offType;
1215            }
1216            if (type.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("_egg")) {
1217                Block block = player.getTargetBlockExact(5, FluidCollisionMode.SOURCE_ONLY);
1218                if (block != null && block.getType() != Material.AIR) {
1219                    Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1220                    if (!this.eventDispatcher.checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB, location, null, true)) {
1221                        event.setCancelled(true);
1222                        event.setUseItemInHand(Event.Result.DENY);
1223                    }
1224                }
1225            }
1226        }
1227    }
1228
1229    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW, ignoreCancelled = true)
1230    public void onInteract(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
1231        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1232        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1233        PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1234        if (area == null) {
1235            return;
1236        }
1237        PlayerBlockEventType eventType;
1238        BlockType blocktype1;
1239        Block block = event.getClickedBlock();
1240        if (block == null) {
1241            // We do not care in this case, the player is likely interacting with air ("nothing").
1242            return;
1243        }
1244        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1245        Action action = event.getAction();
1246        switch (action) {
1247            case PHYSICAL -> {
1248                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.TRIGGER_PHYSICAL;
1249                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1250            }
1251
1252            //todo rearrange the right click code. it is all over the place.
1253            case RIGHT_CLICK_BLOCK -> {
1254                Material blockType = block.getType();
1255                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.INTERACT_BLOCK;
1256                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1257
1258                if (INTERACTABLE_MATERIALS != null ? INTERACTABLE_MATERIALS.contains(blockType.name()) : blockType.isInteractable()) {
1259                    if (!player.isSneaking()) {
1260                        break;
1261                    }
1262                    ItemStack hand = player.getInventory().getItemInMainHand();
1263                    ItemStack offHand = player.getInventory().getItemInOffHand();
1264
1265                    // sneaking players interact with blocks if both hands are empty
1266                    if (hand.getType() == Material.AIR && offHand.getType() == Material.AIR) {
1267                        break;
1268                    }
1269                }
1270
1271                Material type = event.getMaterial();
1272
1273                // in the following, lb needs to have the material of the item in hand i.e. type
1274                switch (type.toString()) {
1275                    case "REDSTONE", "STRING", "PUMPKIN_SEEDS", "MELON_SEEDS", "COCOA_BEANS", "WHEAT_SEEDS", "BEETROOT_SEEDS",
1276                            "SWEET_BERRIES", "GLOW_BERRIES" -> {
1277                        return;
1278                    }
1279                    default -> {
1280                        //eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_BLOCK;
1281                        if (type.isBlock()) {
1282                            return;
1283                        }
1284                    }
1285                }
1286                if (PaperLib.isPaper()) {
1287                    if (MaterialTags.SPAWN_EGGS.isTagged(type) || Material.EGG.equals(type)) {
1288                        eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1289                        break;
1290                    }
1291                } else {
1292                    if (type.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("egg")) {
1293                        eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1294                        break;
1295                    }
1296                }
1297                if (type.isEdible()) {
1298                    //Allow all players to eat while also allowing the block place event to be fired
1299                    return;
1300                }
1301                if (type == Material.ARMOR_STAND) {
1302                    location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getRelative(event.getBlockFace()).getLocation());
1303                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_MISC;
1304                }
1305                if (org.bukkit.Tag.ITEMS_BOATS.isTagged(type) || MINECARTS.contains(type)) {
1306                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_VEHICLE;
1307                    break;
1308                }
1309                if (type == Material.FIREWORK_ROCKET || type == Material.FIREWORK_STAR) {
1310                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1311                    break;
1312                }
1313                if (BOOKS.contains(type)) {
1314                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.READ;
1315                    break;
1316                }
1317            }
1318            case LEFT_CLICK_BLOCK -> {
1319                Material blockType = block.getType();
1320
1321                // todo: when the code above is rearranged, it would be great to beautify this as well.
1322                // will code this as a temporary, specific bug fix (for dragon eggs)
1323                if (blockType != Material.DRAGON_EGG) {
1324                    return;
1325                }
1326
1327                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.INTERACT_BLOCK;
1328                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1329            }
1330            default -> {
1331                return;
1332            }
1333        }
1334        if (this.worldEdit != null && pp.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
1335            if (event.getMaterial() == Material.getMaterial(this.worldEdit.getConfiguration().wandItem)) {
1336                return;
1337            }
1338        }
1339        if (!this.eventDispatcher.checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, eventType, location, blocktype1, true)) {
1340            event.setCancelled(true);
1341            event.setUseInteractedBlock(Event.Result.DENY);
1342        }
1343    }
1344
1345    // Boats can sometimes be placed on interactable blocks such as levers,
1346    // see PS-175. Armor stands, minecarts and end crystals (the other entities
1347    // supported by this event) don't have this issue.
1348    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW, ignoreCancelled = true)
1349    public void onBoatPlace(EntityPlaceEvent event) {
1350        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1351        if (player == null) {
1352            return;
1353        }
1354        Entity placed = event.getEntity();
1355        if (!(placed instanceof Boat)) {
1356            return;
1357        }
1358        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1359        PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1360        if (area == null) {
1361            return;
1362        }
1363        PlayerBlockEventType eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_VEHICLE;
1364        Block block = event.getBlock();
1365        BlockType blockType = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1366        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1367        if (!PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher()
1368                .checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, eventType, location, blockType, true)) {
1369            event.setCancelled(true);
1370        }
1371    }

1373    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1374    public void onBucketEmpty(PlayerBucketEmptyEvent event) {
1375        final Block block = event.getBlock();
1376        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1377        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1378        if (area == null) {
1379            return;
1380        }
1381        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1382        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1383        if (plot == null) {
1384            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1385                return;
1386            }
1387            pp.sendMessage(
1388                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1389                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
1390            );
1391            event.setCancelled(true);
1392        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1393            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1394                return;
1395            }
1396            pp.sendMessage(
1397                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1398                    TagResolver.resolver(
1399                            "node",
1400                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1401                    )
1402            );
1403            event.setCancelled(true);
1404        } else if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1405            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1406                return;
1407            }
1408            pp.sendMessage(
1409                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1410                    TagResolver.resolver(
1411                            "node",
1412                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1413                    )
1414            );
1415            event.setCancelled(true);
1416        } else if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1417            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1418                pp.sendMessage(
1419                        TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted")
1420                );
1421                event.setCancelled(true);
1422            }
1423        }
1424    }

1426    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
1427    public void onInventoryClose(InventoryCloseEvent event) {
1428        HumanEntity closer = event.getPlayer();
1429        if (!(closer instanceof Player player)) {
1430            return;
1431        }
1432        PlotInventory.removePlotInventoryOpen(BukkitUtil.adapt(player));
1433    }

1435    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.MONITOR)
1436    public void onLeave(PlayerQuitEvent event) {
1437        TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(event.getPlayer().getName());
1438        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1439        pp.unregister();
1440        plotListener.logout(pp.getUUID());
1441    }

1443    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1444    public void onBucketFill(PlayerBucketFillEvent event) {
1445        Block blockClicked = event.getBlockClicked();
1446        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(blockClicked.getLocation());
1447        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1448        if (area == null) {
1449            return;
1450        }
1451        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1452        BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1453        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1454        if (plot == null) {
1455            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1456                return;
1457            }
1458            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1459                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1460                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
1461            );
1462            event.setCancelled(true);
1463        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1464            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1465                return;
1466            }
1467            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1468                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1469                    TagResolver.resolver(
1470                            "node",
1471                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1472                    )
1473            );
1474            event.setCancelled(true);
1475        } else if (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
1476            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1477                return;
1478            }
1479            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1480                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1481                    TagResolver.resolver(
1482                            "node",
1483                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1484                    )
1485            );
1486            event.setCancelled(true);
1487        } else if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1488            if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1489                plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1490                        TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted")
1491                );
1492                event.setCancelled(true);
1493            }
1494        }
1495    }
