1497    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1498    public void onHangingPlace(HangingPlaceEvent event) {
1499        Block block = event.getBlock().getRelative(event.getBlockFace());
1500        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1501        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1502        if (area == null) {
1503            return;
1504        }
1505        Player p = event.getPlayer();
1506        if (p == null) {
1507            event.setCancelled(true);
1508            return;
1509        }
1510        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1511        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1512        if (plot == null) {
1513            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1514                pp.sendMessage(
1515                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1516                        TagResolver.resolver(
1517                                "node",
1518                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)
1519                        )
1520                );
1521                event.setCancelled(true);
1522            }
1523        } else {
1524            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1525                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1526                    pp.sendMessage(
1527                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1528                            TagResolver.resolver(
1529                                    "node",
1530                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1531                            )
1532                    );
1533                    event.setCancelled(true);
1534                }
1535                return;
1536            }
1537            if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1538                if (!plot.getFlag(HangingPlaceFlag.class)) {
1539                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1540                        pp.sendMessage(
1541                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1542                                TagResolver.resolver(
1543                                        "node",
1544                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1545                                )
1546                        );
1547                        event.setCancelled(true);
1548                    }
1549                    return;
1550                }
1551            }
1552            if (BukkitEntityUtil.checkEntity(event.getEntity(), plot)) {
1553                event.setCancelled(true);
1554            }
1555
1556        }
1557    }
1558
1559    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1560    public void onHangingBreakByEntity(HangingBreakByEntityEvent event) {
1561        Entity remover = event.getRemover();
1562        if (remover instanceof Player p) {
1563            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1564            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1565            if (area == null) {
1566                return;
1567            }
1568            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1569            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1570            if (plot == null) {
1571                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD)) {
1572                    pp.sendMessage(
1573                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1574                            TagResolver.resolver(
1575                                    "node",
1576                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD)
1577                            )
1578                    );
1579                    event.setCancelled(true);
1580                }
1581            } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1582                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)) {
1583                    pp.sendMessage(
1584                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1585                            TagResolver.resolver(
1586                                    "node",
1587                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)
1588                            )
1589                    );
1590                    event.setCancelled(true);
1591                }
1592            } else if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1593                if (plot.getFlag(HangingBreakFlag.class)) {
1594                    return;
1595                }
1596                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)) {
1597                    pp.sendMessage(
1598                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1599                            TagResolver.resolver(
1600                                    "node",
1601                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)
1602                            )
1603                    );
1604                    event.setCancelled(true);
1605                    plot.debug(p.getName()
1606                            + " could not break hanging entity because hanging-break = false");
1607                }
1608            }
1609        } else if (remover instanceof Projectile p) {
1610            if (p.getShooter() instanceof Player shooter) {
1611                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1612                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1613                if (area == null) {
1614                    return;
1615                }
1616                BukkitPlayer player = BukkitUtil.adapt(shooter);
1617                Plot plot = area.getPlot(BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation()));
1618                if (plot != null) {
1619                    if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1620                        if (!player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)) {
1621                            player.sendMessage(
1622                                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1623                                    TagResolver.resolver(
1624                                            "node",
1625                                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)
1626                                    )
1627                            );
1628                            event.setCancelled(true);
1629                        }
1630                    } else if (!plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
1631                        if (!plot.getFlag(HangingBreakFlag.class)) {
1632                            if (!player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)) {
1633                                player.sendMessage(
1634                                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1635                                        TagResolver.resolver(
1636                                                "node",
1637                                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)
1638                                        )
1639                                );
1640                                event.setCancelled(true);
1641                                plot.debug(player.getName()
1642                                        + " could not break hanging entity because hanging-break = false");
1643                            }
1644                        }
1645                    }
1646                }
1647            }
1648        } else {
1649            event.setCancelled(true);
1650        }
1651    }
1652
1653    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1654    public void onPlayerInteractEntity(PlayerInteractEntityEvent event) {
1655        if (event.getRightClicked().getType() == EntityType.UNKNOWN) {
1656            return;
1657        }
1658        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getRightClicked().getLocation());
1659        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1660        if (area == null) {
1661            return;
1662        }
1663        Player p = event.getPlayer();
1664        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1665        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1666        if (plot == null && !area.isRoadFlags()) {
1667            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)) {
1668                pp.sendMessage(
1669                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1670                        TagResolver.resolver(
1671                                "node",
1672                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1673                        )
1674                );
1675                event.setCancelled(true);
1676            }
1677        } else if (plot != null && !plot.hasOwner()) {
1678            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)) {
1679                pp.sendMessage(
1680                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1681                        TagResolver.resolver(
1682                                "node",
1683                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1684                        )
1685                );
1686                event.setCancelled(true);
1687            }
1688        } else if ((plot != null && !plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) || (plot == null && area
1689                .isRoadFlags())) {
1690            final Entity entity = event.getRightClicked();
1691            final com.sk89q.worldedit.world.entity.EntityType entityType =
1692                    BukkitAdapter.adapt(entity.getType());
1693
1694            FlagContainer flagContainer;
1695            if (plot == null) {
1696                flagContainer = area.getRoadFlagContainer();
1697            } else {
1698                flagContainer = plot.getFlagContainer();
1699            }
1700
1701            if (EntityCategories.HOSTILE.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1702                    .getFlag(HostileInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1703                return;
1704            }
1705
1706            if (EntityCategories.ANIMAL.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1707                    .getFlag(AnimalInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1708                return;
1709            }
1710
1711            // This actually makes use of the interface, so we don't use the
1712            // category
1713            if (entity instanceof Tameable && ((Tameable) entity).isTamed() && flagContainer
1714                    .getFlag(TamedInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1715                return;
1716            }
1717
1718            if (EntityCategories.VEHICLE.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1719                    .getFlag(VehicleUseFlag.class).getValue()) {
1720                return;
1721            }
1722
1723            if (EntityCategories.PLAYER.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1724                    .getFlag(PlayerInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1725                return;
1726            }
1727
1728            if (EntityCategories.INTERACTION.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1729                    .getFlag(InteractionInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1730                return;
1731            }
1732
1733            if (EntityCategories.VILLAGER.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1734                    .getFlag(VillagerInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1735                return;
1736            }
1737
1738            if ((EntityCategories.HANGING.contains(entityType) || EntityCategories.OTHER
1739                    .contains(entityType)) && flagContainer.getFlag(MiscInteractFlag.class)
1740                    .getValue()) {
1741                return;
1742            }
1743
1744            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1745                pp.sendMessage(
1746                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1747                        TagResolver.resolver(
1748                                "node",
1749                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1750                        )
1751                );
1752                event.setCancelled(true);
1753            }
1754        }
1755    }
1756
1757    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1758    public void onVehicleDestroy(VehicleDestroyEvent event) {
1759        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getVehicle().getLocation());
1760        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1761        if (area == null) {
1762            return;
1763        }
1764        Entity attacker = event.getAttacker();
1765        if (attacker instanceof Player p) {
1766            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1767            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1768            if (plot == null) {
1769                if (!PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, VehicleBreakFlag.class, true) && !pp.hasPermission(
1770                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_ROAD
1771                )) {
1772                    pp.sendMessage(
1773                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1774                            TagResolver.resolver(
1775                                    "node",
1776                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_ROAD)
1777                            )
1778                    );
1779                    event.setCancelled(true);
1780                }
1781            } else {
1782                if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1783                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_UNOWNED)) {
1784                        pp.sendMessage(
1785                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1786                                TagResolver.resolver(
1787                                        "node",
1788                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_UNOWNED)
1789                                )
1790                        );
1791                        event.setCancelled(true);
1792                        return;
1793                    }
1794                    return;
1795                }
1796                if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1797                    if (plot.getFlag(VehicleBreakFlag.class)) {
1798                        return;
1799                    }
1800                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_OTHER)) {
1801                        pp.sendMessage(
1802                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1803                                TagResolver.resolver(
1804                                        "node",
1805                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_OTHER)
1806                                )
1807                        );
1808                        event.setCancelled(true);
1809                        plot.debug(pp.getName()
1810                                + " could not break vehicle because vehicle-break = false");
1811                    }
1812                }
1813            }
1814        }
1815    }
1816
1817    @EventHandler
1818    public void onItemDrop(PlayerDropItemEvent event) {
1819        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1820        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1821        Location location = pp.getLocation();
1822        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1823        if (area == null) {
1824            return;
1825        }
1826        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1827        if (plot == null) {
1828            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, ItemDropFlag.class, false)) {
1829                event.setCancelled(true);
1830            }
1831            return;
1832        }
1833        UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1834        if (!plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1835            if (!plot.getFlag(ItemDropFlag.class)) {
1836                plot.debug(player.getName() + " could not drop item because of item-drop = false");
1837                event.setCancelled(true);
1838            }
1839        }
1840    }
1841
1842    @EventHandler
1843    public void onItemPickup(EntityPickupItemEvent event) {
1844        LivingEntity ent = event.getEntity();
1845        if (ent instanceof Player player) {
1846            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1847            Location location = pp.getLocation();
1848            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1849            if (area == null) {
1850                return;
1851            }
1852            Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1853            if (plot == null) {
1854                if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DropProtectionFlag.class, true)) {
1855                    event.setCancelled(true);
1856                }
1857                return;
1858            }
1859            UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1860            if (!plot.isAdded(uuid) && plot.getFlag(DropProtectionFlag.class)) {
1861                plot.debug(player.getName() + " could not pick up item because of drop-protection = true");
1862                event.setCancelled(true);
1863            }
1864        }
1865    }
1866
1867    @EventHandler
1868    public void onDeath(final PlayerDeathEvent event) {
1869        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1870        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1871        if (area == null) {
1872            return;
1873        }
1874        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1875        if (plot == null) {
1876            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, KeepInventoryFlag.class, true)) {
1877                event.setCancelled(true);
1878            }
1879            return;
1880        }
1881        if (plot.getFlag(KeepInventoryFlag.class)) {
1882            plot.debug(event.getEntity().getName() + " kept their inventory because of keep-inventory = true");
1883            event.getDrops().clear();
1884            event.setKeepInventory(true);
1885        }
1886    }
1887
1888    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // #getLocate is needed for Spigot compatibility
1889    @EventHandler
1890    public void onLocaleChange(final PlayerLocaleChangeEvent event) {
1891        // The event is fired before the player is deemed online upon login
1892        if (!event.getPlayer().isOnline()) {
1893            return;
1894        }
1895        BukkitPlayer player = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1896        // we're stripping the country code as we don't want to differ between countries
1897        player.setLocale(Locale.forLanguageTag(event.getLocale().substring(0, 2)));
1898    }
1899
1900    @EventHandler
1901    public void onPortalEnter(PlayerPortalEvent event) {
1902        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer().getLocation());
1903        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1904        if (area == null) {
1905            return;
1906        }
1907        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1908        if (plot == null) {
1909            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DenyPortalTravelFlag.class, true)) {
1910                event.setCancelled(true);
1911            }
1912            return;
1913        }
1914        if (plot.getFlag(DenyPortalTravelFlag.class)) {
1915            plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " did not travel thru a portal because of deny-portal-travel = true");
1916            event.setCancelled(true);
1917        }
1918    }
1919
1920    @EventHandler
1921    public void onPortalCreation(PortalCreateEvent event) {
1922        String world = event.getWorld().getName();
1923        if (PlotSquared.get().getPlotAreaManager().getPlotAreasSet(world).size() == 0) {
1924            return;
1925        }
1926        BukkitPlayer pp = (event.getEntity() instanceof Player player) ? BukkitUtil.adapt(player) : null;
1927        int minX = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
1928        int maxX = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
1929        int minZ = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
1930        int maxZ = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
1931        for (BlockState state : event.getBlocks()) {
1932            minX = Math.min(state.getX(), minX);
1933            maxX = Math.max(state.getX(), maxX);
1934            minZ = Math.min(state.getZ(), minZ);
1935            maxZ = Math.max(state.getZ(), maxZ);
1936        }
1937        int y = event.getBlocks().get(0).getY(); // Don't need to worry about this too much
1938        for (Location location : List.of( // We don't care about duplicate locations
1939                Location.at(world, minX, y, minZ),
1940                Location.at(world, minX, y, maxZ),
1941                Location.at(world, maxX, y, minZ),
1942                Location.at(world, maxX, y, maxZ)
1943        )) {
1944            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1945            if (area == null) {
1946                continue;
1947            }
1948            if (area.notifyIfOutsideBuildArea(pp, location.getY())) {
1949                event.setCancelled(true);
1950                return;
1951            }
1952            Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1953            if (plot == null) {
1954                if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DenyPortalsFlag.class, true)) {
1955                    event.setCancelled(true);
1956                    return;
1957                }
1958                continue;
1959            }
1960            if (plot.getFlag(DenyPortalsFlag.class)) {
1961                StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
1962                if (event.getEntity() != null) {
1963                    builder.append(event.getEntity().getName()).append(" did not create a portal");
1964                } else {
1965                    builder.append("Portal creation cancelled");
1966                }
1967                plot.debug(builder.append(" because of deny-portals = true").toString());
1968                event.setCancelled(true);
1969                return;
1970            }
1971        }
1972    }
1973
1974    @EventHandler
1975    public void onPlayerTakeLecternBook(PlayerTakeLecternBookEvent event) {
1976        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1977        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1978        Location location = pp.getLocation();
1979        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1980        if (area == null) {
1981            return;
1982        }
1983        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1984        if (plot == null) {
1985            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, LecternReadBookFlag.class, true)) {
1986                event.setCancelled(true);
1987            }
1988            return;
1989        }
1990        if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1991            if (plot.getFlag(LecternReadBookFlag.class)) {
1992                plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " could not take the book because of lectern-read-book = true");
1993                event.setCancelled(true);
1994            }
1995        }
1996    }
